statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 23 \\ -7 \\ 1 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 28 \\ -10 \\ 2 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -63 \\ 14 \\ 0 \\ -28 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
